p: According to the above experimental results, the optimal conditions to prepare the Cu foams are described as follow: 10 mg mL âˆ’1 FeCl 3 in 0.1 M HCl was used for the etching process about 10 min with consequent ultrosonication. After the etched foam was rinsed by water and dried by N 2, 5 mL 10 mM n-ODE in ethanol solution was then applied for the modification about 10 min, respectively.
